thoughtText: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood.
Be alone, that is the secret of invention; be alone, that is when ideas are born.
What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
Tact is the knack of making a point without making an enemy.
I can excuse everything but boredom. Boring people don't have to stay that way.
The first principle is that you must not fool yourself â€” and you are the easiest person to fool.
You can't have everything you want, but you can have the things that really matter to you.
Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
The upside of painful knowledge is so much greater than the downside of blissful ignorance.
